yandex-music-linux.title: Yandex Music Linux
yandex-music-linux.description: An unofficial Linux client for Yandex Music streaming service, bringing the popular Russian music platform to Linux users. Features offline mode, system integration, and packages for all major Linux distributions.

personal-website.title: Personal Website
personal-website.description: Modern portfolio website with animations, multilingual support, and a blog system. Built with React, TypeScript, and styled-components.
